content: Singaporean sportswear brand **Kubba Sportswear** is a Singapore [sportswear](/wiki/Sportswear_(activewear)) brand founded in 2006. The headquarters are located at Swen Labels International Pte. Ltd. located at One Fullerton, Singapore. The company designs and manufactures shoes, clothing and accessories. It also supplies police and military uniforms and tactical boots and gears as well. ## Sponsorships Kubba is a sponsor of international football brands across the world. The company sponsors both football and volleyball teams. ### Former sponsored teams #### National teams ##### Africa - [Burkina Faso](/wiki/Burkina_Faso_national_football_team) - [Ghana](/wiki/Ghana_national_football_team) - [Kenya](/wiki/Kenya_national_football_team) - [Liberia](/wiki/Liberia_national_football_team) - [Libya](/wiki/Libya_national_football_team) - [Nigeria](/wiki/Nigeria_national_football_team) - [Sudan](/wiki/Sudan_national_football_team) - [Zambia](/wiki/Zambia_national_football_team) ##### Asia - [Iran](/wiki/Iran_national_football_team) - [Iraq](/wiki/Iraq_national_football_team) - [Myanmar](/wiki/Myanmar_national_football_team) - [Oman](/wiki/Oman_national_football_team) - [Timor-Leste](/wiki/Timor-Leste_national_football_team) ### Current sponsored teams #### Football clubs Africa - [LPRC Oilers](/wiki/LPRC_Oilers) - [Asante Kotoko SC](/wiki/Asante_Kotoko_SC) (2014) - [Berekum Chelsea F.C.](/wiki/Berekum_Chelsea_F.C.) (2010) Asia - [Perlis FA](/wiki/Perlis_FA) (2012) - [Kuala Muda Naza FC](/wiki/Kuala_Muda_Naza_FC) (2009) Europe - [FK Jagodina](/wiki/FK_Jagodina) (2013) - Official Website - Swen Labels International
title: Kubba Sportswear
